body:
$!
Renew your tax credits once a year - the deadline is usually 31 July but you renewal pack will confirm the deadline.
$!

^ You can't renew until you get your renewal pack. ^

Renewal packs are sent between May and June. If you claimed tax credits after 6 April, it will be sent the following year. 

Your pack tells you how to renew your tax credits, you usually do it by post or phone. 

Within 8 weeks of renewing, the Tax Credit Office will send you an award notice telling you how much you'll get.

##Where to send your form

$A
HM Revenue & Customs Tax Credits
Comben House
Farriers Way
Netherton
L75 1WB
$A

$C
**Tax Credit Helpline**  
Telephone: 0345 300 3900    
Textphone: 0345 300 3909  
Outside the UK: +44 2890 538 192  
Monday to Friday 8am to 8pm     
Saturday 8am to 4pm    
$C

##What you need 

You'll need: 

+ your renewal pack
+ your National Insurance number
+ details about any changes to your circumstances
+ your total income (including your partner's) for the last tax year
+ telephone renewals only - your Tax Credit Helpline password (if you have one)
overview: Renew your tax credits claim - deadline, renewal pack, how to renew, how long it takes
title: Renew your tax credits
